entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023
